tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_55: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'The Most Merciful',verse: 4771,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'Taught the Qur'an,',verse: 4772,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Created man,',verse: 4773,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: '[And] taught him eloquence.',verse: 4774,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,',verse: 4775,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'And the stars and trees prostrate.',verse: 4776,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance',verse: 4777,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'That you not transgress within the balance.',verse: 4778,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.',verse: 4779,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.',verse: 4780,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]',verse: 4781,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'And grain having husks and scented plants.',verse: 4782,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4783,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.',verse: 4784,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.',verse: 4785,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4786,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: '[He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.',verse: 4787,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4788,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];',verse: 4789,},ayah_20: {image: '',text: 'Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.',verse: 4790,},ayah_21: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4791,},ayah_22: {image: '',text: 'From both of them emerge pearl and coral.',verse: 4792,},ayah_23: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4793,},ayah_24: {image: '',text: 'And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.',verse: 4794,},ayah_25: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4795,},ayah_26: {image: '',text: 'Everyone upon the earth will perish,',verse: 4796,},ayah_27: {image: '',text: 'And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.',verse: 4797,},ayah_28: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4798,},ayah_29: {image: '',text: 'Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.',verse: 4799,},ayah_30: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4800,},ayah_31: {image: '',text: 'We will attend to you, O prominent beings.',verse: 4801,},ayah_32: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4802,},ayah_33: {image: '',text: 'O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah ].',verse: 4803,},ayah_34: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4804,},ayah_35: {image: '',text: 'There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.',verse: 4805,},ayah_36: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4806,},ayah_37: {image: '',text: 'And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -',verse: 4807,},ayah_38: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4808,},ayah_39: {image: '',text: 'Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.',verse: 4809,},ayah_40: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4810,},ayah_41: {image: '',text: 'The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.',verse: 4811,},ayah_42: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4812,},ayah_43: {image: '',text: 'This is Hell, which the criminals deny.',verse: 4813,},ayah_44: {image: '',text: 'They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].',verse: 4814,},ayah_45: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4815,},ayah_46: {image: '',text: 'But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -',verse: 4816,},ayah_47: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4817,},ayah_48: {image: '',text: 'Having [spreading] branches.',verse: 4818,},ayah_49: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4819,},ayah_50: {image: '',text: 'In both of them are two springs, flowing.',verse: 4820,},ayah_51: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4821,},ayah_52: {image: '',text: 'In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.',verse: 4822,},ayah_53: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4823,},ayah_54: {image: '',text: '[They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.',verse: 4824,},ayah_55: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4825,},ayah_56: {image: '',text: 'In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -',verse: 4826,},ayah_57: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4827,},ayah_58: {image: '',text: 'As if they were rubies and coral.',verse: 4828,},ayah_59: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4829,},ayah_60: {image: '',text: 'Is the reward for good [anything] but good?',verse: 4830,},ayah_61: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4831,},ayah_62: {image: '',text: 'And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -',verse: 4832,},ayah_63: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4833,},ayah_64: {image: '',text: 'Dark green [in color].',verse: 4834,},ayah_65: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4835,},ayah_66: {image: '',text: 'In both of them are two springs, spouting.',verse: 4836,},ayah_67: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4837,},ayah_68: {image: '',text: 'In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.',verse: 4838,},ayah_69: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4839,},ayah_70: {image: '',text: 'In them are good and beautiful women -',verse: 4840,},ayah_71: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4841,},ayah_72: {image: '',text: 'Fair ones reserved in pavilions -',verse: 4842,},ayah_73: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4843,},ayah_74: {image: '',text: 'Untouched before them by man or jinni -',verse: 4844,},ayah_75: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -',verse: 4845,},ayah_76: {image: '',text: 'Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.',verse: 4846,},ayah_77: {image: '',text: 'So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?',verse: 4847,},ayah_78: {image: '',text: 'Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.',verse: 4848,},name: surah_55,};
